items.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
items.detail: A rich and decadent chocolate cake with a molten chocolate center, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Classic Tiramisu
items.detail: A traditional Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers, mascarpone cheese, and cocoa powder.

items.name: New York Cheesecake
items.detail: A creamy and smooth cheesecake with a graham cracker crust, served with a fresh strawberry topping.

items.name: Crème Brûlée
items.detail: A classic French dessert with a creamy custard base topped with a layer of hard caramelized sugar.

items.name: Apple Pie
items.detail: A traditional apple pie with a flaky crust and a spiced apple filling, served warm with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

items.name: Lemon Tart
items.detail: A tangy and sweet lemon curd filling in a buttery tart shell, topped with a dollop of whipped cream.

items.name: Chocolate Mousse
items.detail: A light and airy chocolate mousse made with dark chocolate and topped with chocolate shavings.

items.name: Panna Cotta
items.detail: A creamy Italian dessert made with sweetened cream and vanilla, served with a berry compote.

items.name: Banoffee Pie
items.detail: A delicious pie made with layers of banana, toffee, and whipped cream on a biscuit base.

items.name: Red Velvet Cake
items.detail: A classic red velvet cake with cream cheese frosting, moist and flavorful.

items.name: Margherita Pizza
items.detail: Classic pizza with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and basil leaves.

items.name: Pepperoni Pizza
items.detail: A delicious pizza topped with spicy pepperoni slices and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: BBQ Chicken Pizza
items.detail: Pizza with BBQ sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and cilantro.

items.name: Hawaiian Pizza
items.detail: A tropical pizza topped with ham, pineapple, and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Veggie Supreme Pizza
items.detail: A healthy pizza loaded with bell peppers, olives, onions, mushrooms, and tomatoes.

items.name: Meat Lover's Pizza
items.detail: A hearty pizza with pepperoni, sausage, bacon, ham, and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Four Cheese Pizza
items.detail: A cheesy delight with mozzarella, cheddar, parmesan, and gorgonzola cheeses.

items.name: Buffalo Chicken Pizza
items.detail: Spicy pizza with buffalo sauce, grilled chicken, red onions, and mozzarella cheese.

items.name: Mediterranean Pizza
items.detail: A flavorful pizza topped with feta cheese, olives, tomatoes, and spinach.

items.name: Pesto Pizza
items.detail: A fresh pizza with pesto sauce, cherry tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.

items.name: Caesar Salad
items.detail: Crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and Caesar dressing.

items.name: Greek Salad
items.detail: Fresh cucumbers, tomatoes, olives, red onions, feta cheese, and Greek dressing.

items.name: Caprese Salad
items.detail: Sliced fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil, seasoned with salt and olive oil.

items.name: Cobb Salad
items.detail: Mixed greens topped with chicken, bacon, avocado, blue cheese, egg, and tomatoes.

items.name: Quinoa Salad
items.detail: Quinoa with mixed greens, cucumbers, tomatoes, red onions, and a lemon vinaigrette.

items.name: Waldorf Salad
items.detail: Fresh apples, grapes, celery, and walnuts on a bed of lettuce with a creamy dressing.

items.name: Spinach Salad
items.detail: Baby spinach, red onions, bacon, hard-boiled eggs, and mushrooms with a warm bacon dressing.

items.name: Taco Salad
items.detail: Mixed greens with seasoned ground beef, cheddar cheese, tomatoes, and sour cream in a tortilla bowl.

items.name: Asian Chicken Salad
items.detail: Grilled chicken, mixed greens, mandarin oranges, almonds, and crispy noodles with sesame dressing.

items.name: Nicoise Salad
items.detail: Tuna, green beans, hard-boiled eggs, olives, and potatoes on a bed of mixed greens with vinaigrette.

items.name: Tomato Basil Soup
items.detail: Rich and creamy tomato soup infused with fresh basil leaves.

items.name: Chicken Noodle Soup
items.detail: Classic soup with tender chicken, noodles, carrots, celery, and herbs.

items.name: Minestrone Soup
items.detail: Hearty vegetable soup with beans, pasta, tomatoes, and Italian herbs.

items.name: Lentil Soup
items.detail: Nutritious soup made with lentils, carrots, onions, and a blend of spices.

items.name: Cream of Mushroom Soup
items.detail: Creamy soup with mushrooms, onions, garlic, and a hint of thyme.

items.name: Butternut Squash Soup
items.detail: Smooth and velvety soup made from roasted butternut squash and spices.

items.name: Clam Chowder
items.detail: Rich and creamy chowder with clams, potatoes, onions, and celery.

items.name: French Onion Soup
items.detail: Savory soup with caramelized onions, beef broth, and melted cheese on top.

items.name: Vegetable Soup
items.detail: A medley of fresh vegetables simmered in a flavorful broth.

items.name: Potato Leek Soup
items.detail: Creamy soup with potatoes, leeks, onions, and a touch of cream.
